skins.shipDescription: Oh? You don't seem to fear me... Who might you be? ...I see, so it is you who rules over this place. Then I shall call you "Commander." I am Nyotengu. You would do best to keep me entertained, hehe.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am undoubtedly a tengu. Oh? If you have any doubts, why not confirm it with those eyes and hands? Ah-haha...?
skins.acquisition: Oh? You don't seem to fear me... Who might you be? ...I see, so it is you who rules over this place. Then I shall call you "Commander." I am Nyotengu. You would do best to keep me entertained, hehe.
skins.login: Just arriving, Commander? Heheh, you will show me around the port, won't you?
skins.details: Well, well. What shall I do for amusement now... Have you any good ideas?
skins.secretaryIdle1: In order to fly, humans created airplanes... I wonder how the view from within one is?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'd like to drink some tea while snacking on some manjuu... Not those little ones you have here, mind you. Ah-haha.
skins.secretaryIdle3: There is a strange presence within the ranks of the Sakura Empire. Hehehe, interesting, how very interesting...
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you planning on checking my body yourself? Hehe, how daring.

skins.shipDescription: Oho! To think there was a place with this much class... Not bad! I shall hereby be enjoying my hot springs vacation right here, hehehe.
skins.acquisition: Oho! To think there was a place with this much class... Not bad! I shall hereby be enjoying my hot springs vacation right here, hehehe.
skins.login: What are you doing, standing there like a fool? Don't hold back, come closer... to my side.
skins.details: Your port is quite fine. With hot springs and beaches, there are plenty a wonderful place to choose... This looks to be quite the auspicious vacation, indeed, ah-haha.
skins.secretaryIdle1: More than me, you seem to be the one direly in need of a vacation.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hehehe, Commander, won't you join me for a drink under these beautiful, crimson leaves?
skins.secretaryIdle3: What are you looking at? If there's something that interests you... shouldn't you take a closer look? Ah-haha.
skins.secretaryTouch: Hehe, I wouldn't mind it if you... came closer.
